name: ruffle-extension
description: Extension packaging for Ruffle Flash emulator

scripts.build: npm run build:generic && npm run build:firefox
scripts.build:generic: webpack --env generic && node tools/inject_plugin_polyfill.js && node tools/zip.js dist/ruffle_extension.zip
scripts.build:firefox: webpack --env firefox && node tools/inject_plugin_polyfill.js && node tools/zip.js dist/firefox_unsigned.xpi && npm run sign-firefox
